channel.title: Connection to the Server
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape. I've got this problem, that i can't connect to my server. It's on a VPS, everybody else can connect except me. "/­error_game_js5co­nnect.­ws" Is the problem, it sends the request for the ip, but then it gets rejected and i get the /­error_game_js5co­nnect.­ws. Tried the webclient, i can't but my friend can. I've got java updated etc.
Any solutions?

item.title: Connection to the Server
item.dc:creator: @random_dude4 random dude4
item.description:
@random_dude4 wrote:

Hello Moparscape.
I’ve got this problem, that i can’t connect to my server. It’s on a VPS, everybody else can connect except me. “/­error_game_js5co­nnect.­ws” Is the problem, it sends the request for the ip, but then it gets rejected and i get the /­error_game_js5co­nnect.­ws. Tried the webclient, i can’t but my friend can. I’ve got java updated etc.

Any solutions?
